Card_description: Coal is highly polluting. A carbon tax puts a monetary price on the real costs imposed on our economy* our communities and our planet by greenhouse gas emissions and the global warming they cause.
Your pension helps you to maintain your standard of living in retirement* and savings provide important supplemental income for unforeseen expenses.
In the field of public health* sustainability has been defined as the capacity to maintain program services at a level that will provide ongoing prevention and treatment for a health problem

Increasing taxes on cigarettes is a win-win proposition: significantly increasing cigarette taxes results in fewer kids starting to smoke* and in more adults quitting while at the same time providing substantial revenue to fund important health
A process designed to reduce the amount of pollutants emitted from the burning of fossil fuels at an industrial facility* a power plant* or another source.
In fact* compared to cars and airplanes* trains emit between 66 and 75 percent less carbon. In terms of energy consumption* use of space* and noise levels* trains are far more sustainable too.
Sustainability is often an element that informs decisions made during the planning* programming* and design phases of highway construction projects.
Regions recognize that tech workers such as data analysts* web developers* engineers* and the like are a prerequisite for economic development.
The official purposes of the Food Stamp were strengthening the agricultural economy and providing improved levels of nutrition among low-income households
Offer quality living conditions to low income communities contributing to more equal and sustainable urban planning.
Help more citizens afford their first household
The development of safe cycling as a mode of transport is an important objective of the transformation towards sustainable mobility in cities.
Create more jobs and circulate the local economy
Immunization directly impacts health (SDG3) and brings a contribution to 14 out of the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
Water treatment reduces the volume of waste that is released into the ecosystem.
Formulate minimum wage to help bussiness bottom lines
